attributes.action: Bring back into public ownership the water companies, so that this basic necessity of life is kept within the financial reach of the lower paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of water in the south west is escalating out of all proportion to the rest of the country. As this is the area with the lowest wages people are finding it difficult to meet the ever increasing cost of the one utility that we cannot live without would it not be fairer to have one tarriff for the whole country that everyone could afford

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
